title: Revert Option Appears Twice in the Popup Menu
description: When opening the context menu in a Java editor, there are two 'Revert' options displayed, which is unexpected.
OB: Upon opening the context menu in a Java editor, there are two 'Revert' options visible.
EB: There should be only one 'Revert' option in the context menu, not two.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click to open the context menu. You will notice that there are two 'Revert' options, one appearing after 'UNDO' and the other before 'FORMAT'.
